name: The Human Condition I: No Greater Love
summary_text: A Japanese pacifist, unable to face the dire consequences of conscientious objection, is transformed by his attempts to compromise with the demands of war-time Japan.

name: Our Family Wedding
summary_text: The weeks leading up to a young couple's wedding are comic and stressful, especially as their respective fathers try to lay their long standing feud to rest.

name: Beyaz Melek
summary_text: Mala Ahmet, the old leader of a Turkish tribe is suffering from cancer. While running away from the compulsory chemotherapy in the hospital he suddenly finds himself in a nursery home where...                See full summary »

name: Mansfield Park
summary_text: At age 10, Fanny Price is sent by her destitute mother to live with her aunt and uncle, Sir Thomas and Lady Bertram. As a child she was often made to feel that she was the poor relation but...                See full summary »

name: Dirty Love
summary_text: A jilted photographer goes on a mission to get back at her philandering model boyfriend and along the way discovers that not all love is created equal.

name: Six-String Samurai
summary_text: In the post-apocalyptic world of 1960s Nevada, a rock 'n' roll samurai on his way to Lost Vegas takes a young orphan boy under his protection as Death and his metalhead Horsemen chase after them.

name: The Family That Preys
summary_text: Two families from different walks of life learn to work together.

name: Deadly Friend
summary_text: After his friend is killed by her abusive father, the new kid in town attempts to save her by implanting robotic microchips into her brain.

name: La tête en friche
summary_text: A semi-literate and lonely odd-job man bonds with a much older and well-read woman.

name: Night Falls on Manhattan
summary_text: A newly elected District Attorney finds himself in the middle of a police corruption investigation that may involve his father and his partner.

name: Sword Art Online the Movie: Ordinal Scale
summary_text: Kirito uncovers a conspiracy within Ordinal Scale, a popular AR game developed for a new system called The Augma.

name: The Ninth Configuration
summary_text: A former marine arrives at a mental asylum housed in a remote castle to run it. There he attempts to rehabilitate the patients by letting them act out their craziest fantasies and desires.

name: Army of One
summary_text: After a personal visit by God himself, the eccentric construction worker Gary Faulkner takes the decision to embark on an adventure in the badlands of Pakistan to bring Al-Qaeda's leader Osama Bin Laden to justice.

name: Bounty Killer
summary_text: Bounty killers compete for body count, fame and a fat stack of cash. They're ending the plague of corporate greed and providing the survivors of the apocalypse with retribution. This is the age of the BOUNTY KILLER.

name: Haunted Honeymoon
summary_text: Two radio voice actors are getting married. Larry has fits of fear. A shrink needs 36 hours to scare him to death and cure him - a family reunion at a scary family castle.

summary_text: Urban comedy, happening during a night in Belgrade. Mare, Pop and Gojko are three friends who grew up together. Mare and Pop have always been musicians, while Gojko (who was harassed by ...                See full summary »

name: An Angel at My Table
summary_text: Janet Frame was a brilliant child who, as a teen, was misdiagnosed with schizophrenia. Explore Janet's discovery of the world and her life in Europe as her books are published to acclaim.

name: Dedication
summary_text: The romantic comedy follows a misogynistic children's book author who is forced to work closely with a female illustrator instead of his long-time collaborator and only friend.

name: Ulee's Gold
summary_text: A reclusive beekeeper slowly pulls his dysfunctional family back together, but not without having to fight his son's previous dastardly cohorts.

name: Chloe in the Afternoon
summary_text: Though he has an adoring wife, a bourgeois man is still tempted to pursue other women.

name: Mysterious Island
summary_text: During the Civil War a group of Union soldiers and two Confederates escape the stockade using a hot air balloon and end up on a strange Pacific island.

name: Bones
summary_text: Over 20 years after his death by a gunshot, Jimmy Bones comes back as a ghost to wreak revenge on those who killed him and to clean up his neighborhood.

name: Hababam Sinifi Askerde
summary_text: Hababam Sinifi is going to the army. After graduating from school, it is time military service.

name: Ocho apellidos catalanes
summary_text: Amaia after breaking up with Rafa, falls in love with a Catalonian. Koldo, her father, goes to Sevilla to persuade Rafa to go to Catalonia and take Amaia's heart back.

name: Little Women
summary_text: The four daughters of a New England family fight for happiness during and after the Civil War.

name: Burning Bright
summary_text: A thriller centered on a young woman and her autistic little brother who are trapped in a house with a ravenous tiger during a hurricane.

name: Thriller: A Cruel Picture
summary_text: A young woman, muted after a sexual assault as a child, is trained to seek violent revenge on those who have wronged her after being kidnapped and forced to work as a prostitute.

name: Mulholland Dr.
summary_text: After a car wreck, an amnesiac woman sets out to learn what happened to her with the help of a wannabe actress.

name: The Lost Battalion
summary_text: Fact-based war drama about an American battalion of over 500 men which gets trapped behind enemy lines in the Argonne Forest in October 1918 France during the closing weeks of World War I.

summary_text: A marshal tries to bring the son of an old friend, an autocratic cattle baron, to justice for his role in the rape and murder of the marshal's Native American wife.

name: Through the Olive Trees
summary_text: A depiction of the off-screen relationship between the actors who play the newlyweds in the film And Life Goes On (1992).

name: Good Advice
summary_text: An investment banker loses everything and must discover what's important in life.

name: Buying the Cow
summary_text: A commitment-averse man frantically hits the dating scene after his girlfriend starts pressuring him to pop the question.

name: Space Truckers
summary_text: A space trucker and his cute fiancee are on their way from a space station to Earth with an unknown cargo. When space pirates hijack them, 5000 disintegrator robots are found in the cargo.

name: Shoeshine
summary_text: Two shoeshine boys in postwar Rome, Italy, save up to buy a horse, but their involvement as dupes in a burglary lands them in juvenile prison where the experience take a devastating toll on their friendship.

name: The Greasy Strangler
summary_text: Ronnie runs a Disco walking tour with his son, Brayden. When a sexy woman takes the tour, it begins a competition between father and son for her love. It also signals the arrival of an oily strangler who stalks the streets at night.

summary_text: Jessica Burns enlists the help of her best friend, Brian, in order to document the relentless harassment she's received from her former friend, Avery Keller, one of South Brookdale High School's most popular students.

summary_text: The troubled Vuillard family is no stranger to illness, grief, and banishment, but when their matriarch requires a bone-marrow transplant, the estranged clan reunites just in time for Christmas.

summary_text: Tony Award-winning actor and playwright Harvey Fierstein re-creates his role as the unsinkable Arnold Beckoff in this film adaptation of the smash Broadway play TORCH SONG TRILOGY. A very ...                See full summary »

name: Citadel
summary_text: An agoraphobic father teams up with a renegade priest to save his daughter from the clutches of a gang of twisted feral children who committed an act of violence against his family years earlier.

name: Tous les matins du monde
summary_text: The story of Monsieur de Sainte Colombe, fierce and somber man, grand master of the viola da gamba and professor of Marin Marais, prestigious musician in the court of Louis XIV.

summary_text: A football team from Belgrade, in the former Yugoslavia, gets a chance to go to the First World Football Championship, but things get complicated along the way.

summary_text: Terror strikes the underground train system in Moscow in the form of a flood from a collapsed tunnel.

name: Woodlawn
summary_text: A gifted high school football player must learn to embrace his talent and his faith as he battles racial tensions on and off the field.

summary_text: Sarah begins to confront her shortcomings after she rejects her boyfriend's hasty proposal and soon finds herself in a rebound romance. Meanwhile, her sister Beth is immersed in the details of her wedding.

name: London Fields
summary_text: Clairvoyant femme fatale Nicola Six has been living with a dark premonition of her impending death by murder. She begins a tangled love affair with three uniquely different men: one of whom she knows will be her murderer.

summary_text: An unassuming pet photographer is thrown into serious action, adventure and romance when he's forced to marry a Croatian bride and spend his honeymoon at a remote tropical resort where she is kidnapped.

name: Looking for Mr. Goodbar
summary_text: A dedicated schoolteacher spends her nights cruising bars, looking for abusive men with whom she can engage in progressively violent sexual encounters.

name: The Bank Dick
summary_text: Henpecked Egbert Sousé has comic adventures as a substitute film director and unlikely bank guard.

name: California Suite
summary_text: Misadventures of four groups of guests at the Beverly Hills Hotel.

name: The Butcher's Wife
summary_text: A clairvoyant impulsively marries a butcher, moves to New York City and has a positive impact on the people she meets, changing their futures...which in turn changes hers.

summary_text: Four inseparable friends try to face their midlife crisis with daytrips and pranks at the expense of their families and the people around them.

summary_text: International art dealer Ron Hall must befriend a dangerous homeless man in order to save his struggling marriage to his wife, a woman whose dreams will lead all three of them on the journey of their lives.

summary_text: The U.S. must join forces with the U.S.S.R. in order to destroy a gigantic asteroid heading straight for Earth.

name: Black Eagle
summary_text: CIA agent must outrace KGB agent in searching of super weapon lost in Mediterranean.

summary_text: Pals Danny and Frank spend the summer after high school working as lifeguards while figuring out their future.

summary_text: A successful family man with a blossoming political career loses all sense of morality when he becomes addicted to using an escort agency.

summary_text: In the summer of 1978, a teenager and his group of friends face new challenges when their neighborhood roller-skating rink closes, forcing them to visit a different rink.

summary_text: A psychotic redneck, who owns a dilapidated hotel in rural East Texas, kills various people who upset him or his business, and he feeds their bodies to a large crocodile that he keeps as a pet in the swamp beside his hotel.

summary_text: A small-town loser determines to have one more shot at the big time by winning a football game.

name: The Secret Scripture
summary_text: A woman keeps a diary of her extended stay at a mental hospital.

name: 6 Below: Miracle on the Mountain
summary_text: An adrenaline seeking snowboarder gets lost in a massive winter storm in the back country of the High Sierras where he is pushed to the limits of human endurance and forced to battle his own personal demons as he fights for survival...."

summary_text: After his twin brother is accidentally killed by vengeful bullies, a 12-year old boy and his friends face the harsh realities of death, teenage hormones, and family dysfunction.

summary_text: A young boy living in 1950s suburbia suspects his parents are cannibalistic murderers.

summary_text: When billionaire Jean-Marc Clement learns that he is to be satirized in an off-Broadway revue, he passes himself off as an actor playing him in order to get closer to the beautiful star of the show, Amanda Dell.

summary_text: Friends gather at a wedding, but the celebration's shattered by terrifying apocalyptic events, which force them to re-examine life, choices they've made...

summary_text: A talented martial arts student goes after his expelled brother, who get into bad company.

summary_text: The lives of a young man and woman, an infamous gangster and a group of street kids converge one day in a volatile New York City slum.

summary_text: After surviving a gang rape and mugging, a middle aged businesswoman and her 23 year old boyfriend plot to murder their attackers, but find themselves conflicted about carrying out their plans.

summary_text: A man accepts a challenge to act as the Chief Minister of Tamil Nadu for one day only, and makes such a success of it that soon he is embroiled in political intrigue.

summary_text: An idle part-time college lecturer is annoyed by the yapping sound of a nearby dog. He decides to take drastic action.

summary_text: A boxer struggles to make his mark in the boxing world.

summary_text: The story of three generations of a Turkish immigrant family.

summary_text: A young orphan girl, Sophie, gets taken away to a faraway land populated by Giants and Dreams.

name: Strangeland

name: Long Shot

name: Results
summary_text: Two mismatched personal trainers' lives are upended by the actions of a new, wealthy client.

summary_text: Life on Earth is rapidly destroyed except for a small area in Eastern Europe.

name: The Protector 2
summary_text: When the owner of a major elephant camp is murdered, Kham finds himself the number one suspect and on the run from both the police and the deceased's vengeful twin nieces. But luck is on ...                See full summary »

name: Deceived
summary_text: A man is murdered when checking authenticity of ancient Egyptian jewelry at a museum. Adrienne finds out after the death of her husband, that he was using a fake name. Are the 2 deaths linked?

name: Space Mutiny
summary_text: A pilot is the only hope to stop the mutiny of a spacecraft by its security crew, who plot to sell the crew of the ship into slavery.

name: Five Deadly Venoms
summary_text: The final student of a dying martial arts master is instructed to locate the previous five students and defeat any evil ones among them.

name: Battleground
summary_text: True tale about a squad of the 101st Airborne Division coping with being trapped by the Germans in the besieged city of Bastogne, Belgium during the Battle of the Bulge in December of 1944.

name: Ticker
summary_text: After a San Francisco detective's partner is murdered by Northern Irish terrorists, the officer joins the bomb squad in order to bring them to justice.

name: Elles
summary_text: On her latest assignment, a journalist for Elle immerses herself in a prostitution ring run by university students.

name: School Daze
summary_text: A not so popular young man wants to pledge to a popular fraternity at his historically black college.

name: Lacombe, Lucien
summary_text: In 1944, an 18-year old boy from small-town France, collaborates with the Nazi-regime and subsequently falls in love with a Jewish girl.

name: The Broadway Melody
summary_text: A pair of sisters from the vaudeville circuit try to make it big time on Broadway, but matters of the heart complicate the attempt.

name: Potato Salad
summary_text: When a deadly zombie virus infects a school in Germany it remains on the student Leo to save the world.

name: The Client List
summary_text: A young woman takes a job at a massage parlor to support her family when her husband is unable to work, and soon finds her life spiraling out of control.

name: A Low Down Dirty Shame
summary_text: An ex-cop, now a private detective, takes on the search for the millions stolen by a drug lord.

name: Awarapan
summary_text: A loyal henchman is ordered by his boss to keep an eye on his mistress, and trouble begins when he refuses to kill her.

name: Kenny
summary_text: This hilarious mockumentary film follows the numerous misadventures of a porta-john worker through both his personal and professional life, including an oddly glamorous excursion to the Pumper and Cleaner Expo in Nashville, TN.

name: Dark Floors
summary_text: A man emerges with his autistic daughter and three others from a hospital elevator to find themselves trapped in the building with devilish monsters.

name: Takedown
summary_text: This film is based on the story of the capture of computer hacker Kevin Mitnick.

name: 2 or 3 Things I Know About Her
summary_text: A day in the life of a Parisian housewife/prostitute, interspersed with musings on the Vietnam War and other contemporary issues.

name: Nine Lives
summary_text: Captives of the very relationships that define and sustain them, nine women resiliently meet the travails and disappointments of life.

name: Of Human Bondage
summary_text: A young man finds himself attracted to a cold and unfeeling waitress who may ultimately destroy them both.

name: Advise & Consent
summary_text: Senate investigation into the President's newly nominated Secretary of State, gives light to a secret from the past, which may not only ruin the candidate, but the President's character as well.

name: Pure Luck
summary_text: An accountant with super bad luck is sent in search of a missing boss's daughter, also an incredibly unlucky.

name: Deliver Us from Eva
summary_text: Eva doesn't let her 3 sisters' men push them around. She's always butting in. How to pacify Eva? Find her a man. The men pay a playboy to be that man. The problem is - he falls in love with Eva.

name: The Bad Education Movie
summary_text: Mr Wickers and his class go on one final school trip after they finish their GCSEs.

name: The Even Stevens Movie
summary_text: Dream vacation Dream on! Ren, Louis, and the entire Stevens family battle ferocious squirrels, angry natives and one another on the adventure of a lifetime.

name: Ji jie hao
summary_text: A soldier fights to gain recognition for comrades who died during the Chinese Civil War.

name: Cold Comfort Farm
summary_text: A recently orphaned young woman goes to live with eccentric relatives in Sussex, where she sets about improving their gloomy lives.

name: Delusions of Grandeur
summary_text: In 17th-century Spain, the Minister of Finance tries to dishonor the queen with an overly complex plan.

name: The Land of Steady Habits
summary_text: After leaving his wife and his job to find happiness, Anders befriends a drug-addicted teen, sending him down a path of reckless and shameful behavior.

name: Das Wunder von Bern
summary_text: A young boy from a working class family in post-war Germany struggles with his estranged father returning from war captivity, while a friend of his plays for the German National Soccer Team at the 1954 FIFA World Cup in Switzerland.

name: The Extraordinary Journey of the Fakir
summary_text: Ajatashatru Lavash Patel has lived all his life in a small Mumbai neighborhood tricking people with street magic and fakir stunts. He sets out on a journey to find his estranged father but instead gets dragged on a never-ending adventure.

name: Gülen Gözler
summary_text: Yasar and his wife Nezaket have kept on producing children in the hope of finally getting a male child. But they end up with only daughters instead (who they give masculine names). Now they...                See full summary »

name: Bill Burr: You People Are All the Same.
summary_text: Funnyman Bill Burr takes the stage to uncork a profanity-laced, incisive routine that pokes fun at plastic surgery, reality TV, gold diggers and more.

name: Miracle in Milan
summary_text: An open hearted and unrelentingly energetic orphan struggles to make the best out of his life on the streets of Milan.

name: Maigret's Dead Man
summary_text: Maigret plunges into the murky Parisian underworld.

name: How Much Do You Love Me?
summary_text: An ordinary clerk hires a gorgeous prostitute for one night. When that night is over, he doesn't want to let her go. She agrees to stay with him, but her boss wants her back.

name: Spacewalk
summary_text: Trying to keep lead in the Space Race, the Soviet Union is preparing two cosmonauts for the first spacewalk.

name: My Giant
summary_text: Billy Crystal plays a Hollywood agent who stumbles upon Max, a giant living in Romania, and tries to get him into the movies.

name: Lizzie
summary_text: A psychological thriller based on the infamous 1892 murders of Lizzie Andrew Borden's family.

name: Brice de Nice
summary_text: A wannabe surfer parties on the French Riviera while awaiting the perfect wave.

name: 44 Inch Chest
summary_text: A jealous husband and his friends plot the kidnapping of his wife's lover with the intention of restoring his wounded ego.

name: Simon Sez
summary_text: Basketball superstar Dennis Rodman stars as a hip Interpol agent attempting to defeat the deadly plans of a crazed arms dealer.

name: Hush
summary_text: A young couple on a motorway journey are drawn into a game of cat and mouse with a truck driver following a near accident.

name: One Night Stand
summary_text: Max/W.Snipes has a one night stand with Karen/N.Kinski in NYC. He returns to his wife, 2 kids and career in LA but is affected. A year later, Max and Karen meet again by chance, but this time they're with their spouses.

name: Goodbye World
summary_text: When a mysterious terrorist attack causes chaos in the cities, a group of friends take refuge in their countryside cabin. But the challenges of living in a post-apocalyptic world soon take their toll on relationships within the group.

name: Hasan Minhaj: Homecoming King
summary_text: In his first stand-up special, Hasan Minhaj weaves humorous and heartbreaking anecdotes to tell his life story as an Indian-American Muslim. Topics include racism, bullying and meeting the demanding expectations of his immigrant parents.

name: Ram Gopal Varma Ki Aag
summary_text: A pair of bodyguards for a politician find their positions under threat when their employer is implicated in a scandal. Fleeing to Mumbai they find work with a gangster, but also find that the police are onto them.

name: The Parole Officer
summary_text: A failed parole officer framed for murder must enlist the help of his former clients to clear his name.

name: A.I. Rising
summary_text: An intimate relationship between a human and an android tests the boundaries of human nature.

name: Under Capricorn
summary_text: A young gentleman goes to Australia where he reunites with his now married childhood sweetheart, only to find out she has become an alcoholic and harbors dark secrets.

name: Girl in Progress
summary_text: As single mom Grace juggles work, bills, and her affair with a married doctor, her daughter, Ansiedad, plots a shortcut to adulthood after finding inspiration in the coming-of-age stories she's reading for school.

name: If Looks Could Kill
summary_text: Michael has to take summer class in French, a class trip to France, to graduate high school. He is, however, mistaken for an agent and people try to kill him. There are 007 style cars, cuties, crooks etc.

name: The Incredible Jessica James
summary_text: An aspiring playwright in New York strikes up a friendship with a guy while on the rebound from a break-up.

name: Murder 2
summary_text: An ex-cop is hired by a pimp to find missing call girls and the man responsible behind their abduction.

name: Fluke
summary_text: After a man dies in a car crash, he is reincarnated as a dog and attempts to reconnect with his family.

name: Black Robe
summary_text: In the 17th century, a Jesuit missionary nicknamed Black Robe by the natives and his small party of companions try reaching the Huron tribe in Canada all while facing mistrust, Iroquois warring parties and harsh winter conditions.

name: Camera Buff
summary_text: Filip buys an eight-millimetre movie camera when his first child is born. Because it's the first camera in town, he's named official photographer by the local Party boss. His horizons widen...                See full summary »

name: Hateship Loveship
summary_text: A wild teenage girl orchestrates a romance between her nanny and her father, who is a recovering addict.

name: Dracula Has Risen from the Grave
summary_text: When Castle Dracula is exorcised by the Monsignor, it accidentally brings the Count back from the dead. Dracula follows the Monsignor back to his hometown, preying on the holy man's beautiful niece and her friends.

name: Tales of Terror
summary_text: Three tales of terror involve a grieving widower and the daughter he abandoned; a drunkard and his wife's black cat; and a hypnotist who prolongs the moment of a man's death.

name: The Dirties
summary_text: Two best friends are filming a comedy about getting revenge on the bullies at their high school. One of them isn't joking.

name: Daniel Isn't Real
summary_text: A troubled college freshman, Luke, suffers a violent family trauma. He then resurrects his charismatic childhood imaginary friend Daniel to help him cope, not realizing how dangerous Daniel is.

name: Lights in the Dusk
summary_text: In Helsinki, a lonely night watchman is caught up in a series of misadventures with a femme fatale and a crooked businessman.

name: Fortress 2
summary_text: 7 years after the original Fortress movie, Brennick along with the rebels are captured and sent to a new, more sophisticated fortress prison, in outer space.

name: Walk on Water
summary_text: Following the suicide of his wife, an Israeli intelligence agent is assigned to befriend the grandchildren of a Nazi war criminal.

name: Freaked
summary_text: A vain actor, his best friend, and an activist end up at a mutant freak farm run by a weirdo scientist.

name: The Pick-up Artist
summary_text: A womanizer meets his match when he falls for a woman in debt to the mafia.

name: Reflections in a Golden Eye
summary_text: Bizarre tale of sex, betrayal, and perversion at a military post.

name: Osmanli Cumhuriyeti
summary_text: The life of Osman VII. who was the emperor of the Turkish republic.

name: Fateless
summary_text: 14-year-old György's life is torn apart in WWII Hungary, as he is deported first to Auschwitz and then to Buchenwald, where he is forced to become a man in the midst of hatred, and what it really means to be Jewish.

name: Shadowboxer
summary_text: When an assassin is diagnosed with terminal cancer, she decides to carry out one final killing, assisted by her lover and stepson, Mikey.

name: Danton
summary_text: In 1793, as the Terror begins in France, Georges Danton, a champion-of-the-people, returns to clash against Maximilien Robespierre and his extremist party.

name: OHA Diyorum
summary_text: Firat's car gets stolen. Firat and his friends try to get Firat's car back.

name: The Spirit of Christmas
summary_text: 12 days before Christmas, Kate is trying to close the sale of a historic inn, only to find Daniel, the ghost of a man who died a century ago, and he needs her help to unravel the mystery of his annual holiday haunting.

name: Wild Bill
summary_text: The early career of legendary lawman Wild Bill Hickock is telescoped and culminates in his relocation in Deadwood and a reunion with Calamity Jane.

name: Sunshine on Leith
summary_text: Two soldiers return home to Edinburgh to resume their romantic and family lives.

name: Sye Raa Narasimha Reddy
summary_text: A historical action epic inspired by the life of Uyyalawada Narasimha Reddy, who revolted against the atrocities of East India Company 10 years before the Sepoy Mutiny.

name: Kill Bill: The Whole Bloody Affair
summary_text: The Bride must kill her ex-boss and lover Bill who betrayed her at her wedding rehearsal, shot her in the head and took away her unborn daughter. But first, she must make the other four members of the Deadly Viper Assassination Squad suffer.
